All Classes|All Packages

A

attack(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Player
Calls the player to choose an attack action with actionchoice () With this choice, we call the basic attack or the special attack against the opponent 'player'
attackBasic(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Player
We launch a basic attack against the opponent 'player'
attackBasic(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Scout
The basic attack of the Scount against an opponent 'player' Deals damage equal to the Rider's agility.
attackBasic(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Warrior
The Warrior's basic attack against a player opponent Deals damage equal to the player's strength on the opponent.
attackBasic(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Wizard
The Wizard's basic attack against a player opponent Deals damage equal to player's intelligence on the opponent.
attackSpecial(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Player
We launch a special attack against the opponent 'player'
attackSpecial(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Scout
The Scout's special attack The player gains his level divided by 2 in agility.
attackSpecial(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Warrior
The Warrior's special attack against a player opponent Deals damage equal to the player's strength times twice on the opponent.
attackSpecial(Player) - Method in class fm.magicworld.Wizard
The Wizard's special attack The player heals his health and regains his amount of intelligence times 2 health points.
